'Hey Sara, can I talk to you for a sec?'%K%P
'Sure, what's up?'%K%P
I called Sara out, telling her I had\nsomething to talk about.%K%P
'So, what do you think?\nHow do you think the preliminaries will go?'%K%P
I pulled her away from the other two to ask.%K%P
Would both of them make it, or would\none of them get dropped? \nReally, they could BOTH wind up getting dropped.%K%P
'Hmm, yeah...\nI can't really say for sure, but they're both\nwonderful, so I think they might make it.'%K%P
She didn't really have anything to back it up,\nbut it still made me feel more confident.%K%P
'What do you think of them?'%K%P
I wondered if she felt like they were cut out to be\nmembers of L☆SEVEN like she was.%K%P
Whether or not the current members would accept them\nwas more important than getting through auditions,\nreally.%K%P
'Shuri is just what I would expect from her family. \nMaybe a little rough around the edges, but still\nhas her appeal.'%K%P
'And Kagura, her whole personality is her appeal.\nShe's good at dancing too, but it's her ability to\nput a smile on people's faces that's her best trait.'%K%P
'I for one would be more than happy to\nwelcome the both of them as Divine Idols.'%K%P
It seemed like Sara endorsed them. \nNothing could beat a confidence booster like that.%K%P
'It was fun watching them do their thing. \nMakes me think back to when I was first starting out.\nReally brings back memories.'%K%P
'You used to be as lively as them?'%K%P
'Yeah... But, well, I guess there's\nno turning back time...'%K%P
Her mutterings didn't escape me.%K%P
'You've still got it though, Sara.'%K%P
'You think? I don't think I've got it like\nthey do anymore, though.'%K%P
'I feel like I've just kind of lost something\nthat an idol should have, the sort of thing\nyou can never get back...'%K%P
I had no way of knowing what on earth\ncould possibly be going through her mind.%K%P
I could tell that there was always something\nbehind that sweet smile of hers, though.%K%P
'You mind if I ask for your time, next?'%K%P
'I want you to be my mood changer for a bit.'%K%P
As she spoke she wove her hands\naround in a strange way.%K%P
And in a moment she was enveloped in light.%K%P
Once the light faded it was no longer the kindly\nSara before me, but instead it was top idol\nSara Benzaiten.%K%P
'Come on. Make sure you hang on tight.'%K%P
We flew up into the night sky.%K%P
It was like I was some mere mortal\ncaptured by a celestial maiden.%K%P
And just like those old tales of forbidden love,\nI felt suddenly drawn to the sight of her.%K%P
'Sit down right there. Make sure not to fall.'%K%P
She sat me down up on the roof.%K%P
Then she sat down on the very top\nand suddenly pulled out an acoustic guitar.%K%P
'What's with the guitar?'%K%P
'Normally I'd play a biwa lute. \nBut that's a holy instrument,\nso it's no good for normal music.'%K%P
'I pull out this when I just feel like singing. \nThe guitar just gives me that melody I need.'%K%P
She started plucking the strings,\ngetting the guitar in tune.%K%P
'I've been thinking about it for a while now. \nWhether or not this is really how I want things.'%K%P
'I just can't get it out of my mind. \nBut people just keep pushing me higher\nto the top anyway.'%K%P
Sara was the center for L☆SEVEN,\nthe highest position a Divine Idol could reach.%K%P
But she didn't seem to understand why.%K%P
'The more I sing, the more I seem to move\naway from... Something. I don't know what. \nBut it always has me worried.'%K%P
The guitar echoed around as she spoke.%K%P
After it rang out for a bit, she put her hands\non the strings and muted it.%K%P
'Hey, Yamato. \nI just want you to listen.'%K%P
I nodded slightly, and she started playing again.%K%P
But no matter how long she strummed,\nshe never started singing. She just played\nthe intro over and over again.%K%P
'Sara...?'%K%P
She didn't respond to me, either.%K%P
She just kept playing in silence.%K%P
'Why, though...?'%K%P
She wasn't asking me, but instead letting her\nquestion fade out into the night sky.%K%P
'I like that song, you know.'%K%P
'What do you like about it?'%K%P
'It's, well, it's just really relaxing.'%K%P
'It's the kind of song you'd listen to\nwhen you've started falling for someone...'%K%P
I spoke without thinking, and she gulped in response.%K%P
'So... You mean like, when you fall in love?'%K%P
'I guess, yeah. \nIt's kind of embarrassing to talk about, though.'%K%P
'Lots of L☆SEVEN songs are like that, huh?'%K%P
Love songs.%K%P
It wasn't just them either,\nlots of idol songs seemed to revolve around love.%K%P
'Love songs...?'%K%P
'Aren't they?'%K%P
'No... No, I guess you're right. \nHmm, okay, I guess that makes sense...'%K%P
I had no idea what was going on,\nbut she seemed to have figured something out.%K%P
She started muttering like crazy.%K%P
'Sara?'%K%P
'I finally figured it out. \nI finally understand why I've felt so strange.'%K%P
'I've been singing all these love songs for so long,\nnever once even questioning myself.'%K%P
'But that's not right, huh.'%K%P
'Someone who has never loved\nshould never be able to touch the hearts of others.'%K%P
